Declaration

This part of the Professional Indemnity Proposal Form requires the Applicant to declare that the Proposal Form has been completed by answering all of the required questions in full and in accordance with the Applicants Duty of Disclosure. The Applicant must ensure that they have read and understood the Duty of Disclosure and if necessary revise the answers in the Proposal Form; then read, sign and date the declaration below.
